*2010-05-09*: Tunnelblick 3.1beta02 is now [http://tunnelblick.googlecode.com/files/Tunnelblick_3.1beta02.dmg available for download].

New features in this beta build include:

  * *Shared configurations*: Configurations may be shared by all users of a computer without being installed for each user individually. [wShared Details].

  * *Connect when computer starts*: Configurations may be set to connect when the computer starts, before anyone is logged in. Such connections persist through login and logout and may be controlled by Tunnelblick when a user is logged in. [wConnectWhenComputerStarts Details].

  * *Tunnelblick VPN Configuration "packages"*: All of the files associated with one configuration may be collected together and put into a Tunnelblick VPN Configuration. Tunnelblick VPN Configurations include features such as version control that make them easy to use for distribution to multiple Tunnelblick users. [wPkgs Details].

This is a beta release. *Please give feedback on the new features* or report problems in the [http://groups.google.com/group/tunnelblick-discuss Tunnelblick Discussion Group].
